Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

NameDescription
./scalate-util/index.htmlScalate Utilities
./scalate-core/index.htmlScalate Core
./scalate-test/index.htmlScalate Test Support Classes
./scalate-wikitext/index.htmlWikiText Integration for Markdown and Confluence wiki notations
./scalate-page/index.htmlA Multipart page filter similar to the page format found in Webgen
./scalate-web/index.htmlA single dependency for all the modules required to use scalate and the common wiki formats in a web application so includes dependencies on servlets, scala-compiler, scalate-page etc
./scalate-spring-mvc/index.htmlSpring MVC integration for a Scalate web application
./scalate-guice/index.htmlGuice integration for a Jersey based Scalate web application
./scalate-camel/index.htmlCamel component for scalate
Scalate JRebelJRebel plugin to reload Scalate templates on class reload
./scalate-war/index.htmlScalate Base Web Application
./samples/index.html-
./maven-scalate-plugin/index.htmlA Scalate Maven Plugin
./sbt-scalate-plugin/index.htmlAn SBT Maven Plugin
./archetypes/index.html-
./scalate-tool/index.htmlScalate Command Line Tool
./scalate-jsp-converter/index.htmlConverter of JSP to SSP
./scalate-markdownj/index.htmlA Scalate filter that uses MarkdownJ
./scalate-jruby/index.htmlScalate integration with JRuby to access Ruby based filters such as sass
